@Timbo6669

Not totally true. Some files are missing. For example, there's only 2 map files.

Also, someone made a demo editor. You can change the alien types per group, the difficulty and the number of XCOM operators in the second map. There's also some fiddling you can do if you play with the ini and script files.

Just head over to 2K XCOM forums and look for Demo Editor I just Made thread.

By the way, I'm totally buying this one.
